project.title: Parallel Matrix Multiply
project.description: Parallel Matrix Multiplication is C language based method that efficiently multiply matrices with the help of parallel-for implementation in OpenMP library. Apart from that, performance has further improved by optimizing algorithm to reduce cache misses.

project.title: h2opojo
project.description: H2opojo is a java extension, which is designed to use H2O.ai models in WSO2 CEP. This extension only supports for H2O POJO models.
